TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时的一个新的区域虚拟模式中公开和确定需要新范围的项。The event occurs when a new area of a in virtual mode is exposed and the determines a new range of items is needed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#465](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#465)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#465](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#465)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 startIndex, int32 endIndex) cil managed
Public Sub New (startIndex As Integer, endIndex As Integer)

param.name: startIndex
param.span: 所需的一组项的起始索引，这些项用于下次发生的 事件。

span.span: The starting index of a range of items needed by the for the next event that occurs.

param.name: endIndex
param.span: 所需的一组项的结束索引，这些项用于下次发生的 事件。

span.span: The ending index of a range of items needed by the for the next event that occurs.

summary.span: 使用指定的起始索引和结束索引初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified starting and ending indices.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndIndex As Integer
public: property int EndIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取处于虚拟模式的 控件所需的一组值的结束索引。

span.span: Gets the ending index for the range of values needed by a control in virtual mode.

value.span: 控件所需的一组值的结束索引。

span.span: The index at the end of the range of values needed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的值的范围和属性表示最有可能通过虚拟机所需值的范围的下一个匹配项的控件事件。The range of values specified by the and properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual control for the next occurrence of a event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
